accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text-slate-500 is not used on dark backgrounds. Use text-slate-400 or lighter.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-slate-950).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for body text.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data (prices, totals, IBANs).
Implement the Dashboard using the Bento Grid strategy (Mode B from E1 rules).
The Quote Editor MUST look like a real A4 paper on the screen (white box with shadow on gray background).
Use French terminology for all UI elements (Devis, Facture, Client, Montant HT, TVA, TTC).
Ensure all buttons have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle borders.
For the 'Status' column in tables, use the Badge component styles defined above.
The Sidebar should be fixed on the left, white background, with a subtle right border.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8 instead of p-4).
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, active, focus).
Prioritize Shadcn UI components but customize them with the classes defined in 'components' section.
